EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-4998: Customer Experience - Case Close - Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Experience Case Close
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Experience Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE
Your IHS Markit Customer Experience Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear IHS Markit Customer,
The IHS Markit Customer Experience Team has completed and closed case reference number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you feel your request is not yet resolved and/or you have any further questions, please quote the above reference number when contacting us.
Please click here to provide your feedback on your support experience.
Kind regards, IHS Markit | Customer Experience Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
